pages.text: A $(item)Vault$() is a block found in $(l:world/structures#trial_chambers)$(thing)Trial Chambers$(). $(br2)It dispenses loot when unlocked using a $(l:rare/trial_keys)$(item)Trial Key$(). $(br2)Each $(item)Vault$() can be looted by an unlimited number of $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$(), but each one can unlock a specific $(item)Vault$() only once.

$(item)Vaults$() cannot be obtained in Survival and cannot be moved with a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#piston)$(item)Piston$(). $(br2)Theres also an $(item)Ominous Vault$(), it dispenses more valuable loot when unlocked using an $(l:rare/trial_keys)$(item)Ominous Trial Key$().
